name: Daikun
description:
Shooter game where you control a living radish trying to survive against nightmare monsters. Shooting enemies however will corrupt your bullets against you, eventually filling the field with your own bullets that harm you.

-Move with WASD or arrow keys. 

-Aim with mouse.

Teuvo Tyrkkö  -  Game Design & Everything else

Mirnes Selimovic  -  Game Design & 3D Art 

Music from: https://maou.audio/
